message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to let it go for $110.
Thank you for the offer, Alice. I appreciate your willingness to sell the product. I would like to counter with an offer of $95.
I appreciate your counteroffer, Bob. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $105. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit on this sale.
I understand your position, Alice. Let me propose $100 as my final offer for the product.
